name: express-expose

scripts.test-cov: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-travis: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/

description: Expose helpers and local variables to the client-side
author: TJ Holowaychuk <tj@vision-media.ca>
